data.eml:eml: Micropeplusliweiae sp. n., a new species from Sichuan, China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Micropeplinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Cheng-Bin, Jiang, Ri-Xin, Zhu, Jiang (2018): Micropeplusliweiae sp. n., a new species from Sichuan, China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Micropeplinae). ZooKeys 775: 97-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.775.22620, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.775.22620
